Comedy Nights With Kapil
Season 1 Ep. 49
Released: 26/01/14
Running time: 1:02:23

The roller coaster ride of laughs and fun starts with Kapil switching on the ride with his usual wisecracks and one liners. Kapil starts talking on the topic of help taken and given by everyone. Kapil then asks the audience to share their view's on the same topic. Suddenly, Kapil's Dadi and Bua walk in with placards in their hands and tell him that they have opened a organisation for helping all. They are joined by Palak's mother asking for help, as a boy and his family are coming for a marriage alliance and Palak is struck up in the beauty parlour. Later, Shekhar Suman, Adhyan Suman and Aliana for the promotion of their forthcoming movie, Heartless. Watch the episode and have a hearty laugh.

Renowned, actor-comedian Kapil Sharma makes his debut as a TV show producer with his new show Comedy Nights With Kapil. He will be seen multiple roles of an actor, scriptwriter and producer in his production debut. Already famous for his amazing comic timing and his talent to dig humor out of any situation, he is ready present everyday life in a fresh ad unique way.
